scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This folder comprises numerous account statements, receipts, and bills for purchases made by Mrs. Ellen Howard Morgan and her daughter, Miss Ellen "Nellie" Key Howard Morgan, from businesses in Lexington, Kentucky, along with several checks paying for those purchases. The folder also contains letters, most of which are written to and/or from members of the Hunt-Morgan family discussing properties, family matters, and other news.
